name: X-FAB Silicon Foundries SE
goal: X-FAB Silicon Foundries SE is one of the world's leading specialty foundry groups for analog/mixed-signal semiconductor technologies, providing manufacturing and design support services for customers that design analog/mixed-signal integrated circuits (ICs) and other semiconductor devices (e.g. Micro-Electro-Mechanical Systems - MEMS) for use in their own products or the products of their customers. X-FAB creates customized analog/mixed-signal ICs and other semiconductor devices for use in a variety of applications, with a strategic focus on the automotive, industrial and medical device end-user markets.The Group has an established track record, with over 25 years of experience.
interests: Communication, Regional Policy, Research and Technology
euInitiatives: H2020; ECSEL JU; Member of the Electronics Leader Group of the European Comission (DG CONNECT); Important Project of Common European Interest (IPCEI) Microelectronics
